response.explain: The previous action code failed because the robot was not within four meters of the fridge. The robot needs to move closer to the fridge before it can open it.
response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the fridge
(2) Open the fridge
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 1: Move the robot to the fridge
    fridge = registry(env,"fridge_dszchb_0")
    MoveBot(env, robot, fridge, camera)
    donothing(env)
